title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-1.9 - Car operator
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-1.9 - Car operator

State Regulations
(a) Every passenger elevator shall be in charge of a competent and reliable
operator not less than 18 years of age. (b) No person less than 18 years of age shall
operate a freight elevator. Exception:Automatic push button control
elevators. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
8-1.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
